snippet.title: DONKEY KONG II (Nintendo - Game & Watch - 1983)
snippet.description:
Donkey Kong II is a platform game released by Nintendo in 1983, for the Game & Watch handheld.

Donkey Kong is a prisoner and his son needs to collect a key on the bottom screen by climbing vines and dodging crocodiles and electric sparks.

Once obtained, the key moves to the top screen and Junior has to climb up chains, while dodging birds, to unlock each of Donkey Kong's chains.

Donkey Kong Jr. must complete the stage four times to free his beloved father.

-Video Summary:
*Longplay*
00:00 | Intro and setup
00:03 | Loop 1
00:28 | Loop 2
01:20 | Loop 3
01:58 | Loop 4
02:53 | Ending
